title: Pewsey Avon Trail Walking Route

description: A delightful walk along the River Avon from Pewsey to Salisbury that links with the River Avon Trail. You will pass several pretty riverside villages including Upavon, Amesbury and Upper and Lower Woodford. There are fine views of Salisbury Plain and a series of picturesque riverside pubs if you're in need of refreshment. There is also an abundance of water loving wildlife to look out for.
